segments.text: Saint Jude-he's the saint of lost causes . Like my cousin , Anna , who can't stop getting pregnant . She's a lost cause .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that your cousin in the back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yep . She's always got a bun in the oven . She was pregnant before marriage-a real sin in the Catholic Church .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about birth control pills ? Don't they work on Italians ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ha-ha . Birth control and abortion are four-letter words in my family .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And I heard that Italian men have very active libidos .
segments.speaker: S1
